title: Problems from last update
body:
Hi, 

From 18/04/2017 time 8:00 pm prox, i have big problems my ping is very hig (200-209), i cant selecc champions ,ofc i take ban . Today i can select champios and start  but i have ping 209. I test my internet, firewalls,antivirus, etc etc etc.  it make me feel hostil....

replies.body:
That's pretty frustrating dude, and I want to help you get back in-game and take out that hostility on Dragon or something...  If this high ping is consistent then your network could be having some issues holding it together with our game server.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to confirm this.

You'll find the solutions to this through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Give it a go, and let me know if you run into any issues.
